OStim Function Library


OStim:
==============

ostim_actorcount: Returns: int: the actorcount of the OStim scene the targetActor is in; 0 if not in a scene

	Example
		ostim_actorcount $system.self

-=-

ostim_animname: Returns: string: the current OStim animation name

	Example
		ostim_animname $system.self
		msg_notify "Playing: " $$

-=-

ostim_climax: Immediately forces the specified actor to have a OStim orgasm.
May only work during OStim scenes
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: bool: ignoreStall: (optional; default:false) should the ClimaxStalled setting be ignored

	Example
		ostim_climax $system.self
		ostim_climax $system.partner

	Simultaneous orgasms

-=-

ostim_findaction: Returns: int: the action index if the OStim scene metadata has the specified action, -1 otherwise
	- parameter 1: string: action: action name e.g. "vaginalsex", "analsex", "blowjob"
	- parameter 2: Form: actor: (optional; default: $system.self) target Actor

	Example
		ostim_findaction "blowjob" $system.self
		if $$ = true [doORALthing]

-=-

ostim_getrndactor: Returns: Form: a random actor within specified range of self
	- parameter 1: float: range: (0 - all | >0 - range in Skyrim units)
	- parameter 2: int: option: (0 - all | 1 - not in OStim scene | 2 - must be in OStim scene) (optional: default 0 - all)

	Example
		ostim_getrndactor 500 2
		actor_isvalid $actor
		if $$ = false [end]
		msg_notify "Someone is nearby!"
		[end]

-=-

ostim_getsceneid: Returns: string: the SceneID the targetActor is in; "" if not in a scene

	Example
		ostim_getsceneid $system.self
		msg_notify "SceneID: " $$

-=-

ostim_getthreadid: Returns: int: the ThreadID for the OStim thread the target actor is in; -1 if not in a thread

	Example
		ostim_getthreadid $system.self

-=-

ostim_hasaction: Returns: bool: true if the OStim scene metadata has the specified action, false otherwise
	- parameter 1: string: action: action name e.g. "vaginalsex", "analsex", "blowjob"
	- parameter 2: Form: actor: (optional; default: $system.self) target Actor

	Example
		ostim_hasaction "blowjob" $system.self
		if $$ = true [doORALthing]

-=-

ostim_isclimaxstalled: Returns: bool: whether the actor is prevented from climaxing

	Example
		ostim_isclimaxstalled $system.player

-=-

ostim_isin: Returns: bool: true if the specified actor is in a OStim scene, false otherwise

	Example
		ostim_isin $system.self

-=-

ostim_isinslot: Returns: bool: true if the specified actor is in the specified OStim scene slot, false otherwise
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: int: slotnumber: 1-based OStim actor position number

	Example
		ostim_isinslot $system.player 1

-=-

ostim_permitclimax: Permits this actor to climax again (as in it undoes ostim_stallclimax)

	Example
		ostim_permitclimax $system.player

-=-

ostim_stallclimax: Prevents this actor from climaxing, including the prevention of auto climax animations
Does not prevent the climaxes of auto climax animations that already started

	Example
		ostim_stallclimax $system.player

-=-

ostim_waitforend: Wait until specified actor is not in OStim scene

	Example
		ostim_waitforend $self

	Wait until the scene ends

-=-

ostim_waitforkbd: Returns: int: the keycode pressed after waiting for user to press any of the specified keys or for the end of the OStim scene
(See https://ck.uesp.net/wiki/Input_Script for the DXScanCodes)
Usage 1: ostim_waitforkbd <dxscancode> [<dxscancode> ...]
Usage 2: ostim_waitforkbd $keylist ; where $keylist is a int[]
	- parameter 1: int: dxscancode: <DXScanCode of key>
	- parameter 2: int[]: keylist: a list of dxscancode

	Example
		ostim_waitforkbd 74 78 181 55
		listadd $keystowaitfor 74 78 181 55
		ostim_waitforkbd $keystowaitfor
		if $$ = 74 MINUS
		...
		if $$ < 0 END

	; These do the same thing
	Wait for Num-, Num+, Num/, or Num*, or animation expired, and then do something based on the result.

-=-
